jobs.brief: Keep the office running—cleanliness, pantry, file movement, and routine assistance to staff.
jobs.job_description: Support office upkeep and routine assistance to staff, ensuring cleanliness and timely help. Responsibilities include maintaining office cleanliness and pantry, delivering files, assisting staff, and handling basic errands/couriers.

jobs.brief: Maintain hygiene across office/site facilities with disciplined daily cleaning and waste disposal.
jobs.job_description: Maintain cleanliness and hygiene across office/site facilities with discipline and reliability. Duties include daily cleaning and waste disposal, pantry/meeting support, and following basic hygiene and safety practices.

jobs.brief: Protect premises—control entry, patrol, log incidents, and support emergency response.
jobs.job_description: Safeguard premises, control entry/exit, and monitor security procedures. Responsibilities include access control and patrolling, incident logging/reporting, and coordination during emergencies.

jobs.brief: Accurate data entry and record maintenance with basic reporting in MS Office.
jobs.job_description: Enter and verify data with accuracy; maintain records and generate routine reports. Tasks include data entry/validation, maintaining spreadsheets/documents, and supporting reporting and filing.

jobs.brief: Run site/project stores—GRN/issue, stock records, and reconciliation with basic Excel.
jobs.job_description: Manage receipts, issues, and stock records for project/site stores with accuracy and discipline. Maintain GRN/issue registers and bin cards, perform cycle counts and stock reconciliation, and coordinate with procurement/site teams.

jobs.brief: Assist line erection and maintenance; wiring at heights using proper safety gear.
jobs.job_description: Perform line work including wiring at heights with proper safety harness and standards. Assist in line erection/maintenance, handle tools and basic wiring, and follow line-safety practices.

jobs.brief: Panel wiring, terminations, and basic electrical maintenance for solar/industrial sites.
jobs.job_description: Support electrical works in solar projects and facilities, including wiring, terminations, and basic maintenance. Assist in testing/troubleshooting and follow electrical safety procedures.

jobs.brief: Execute routine solar plant maintenance—checks, cleaning, inverter/HT panel support.
jobs.job_description: Execute maintenance tasks in solar plants under O&M engineers to maintain uptime and safety. Perform routine checks/cleaning, assist in inverter/HT panel maintenance, record readings, and support fault repair.

jobs.brief: Voucher entry, reconciliations, and file management using Tally and Excel.
jobs.job_description: Assist accounts team with entries, vouchers, reconciliations, and basic compliance. Record vouchers/expenses, perform bank/vendor reconciliations, maintain files, and assist audits.

jobs.brief: Prepare documents and reports in MS Word/Excel; maintain digital records and prints.
jobs.job_description: Provide computer and office software support including data preparation, formatting, and prints. Operate MS Word/Excel, prepare reports/letters, and maintain digital records/backups.

jobs.brief: Operate and maintain HT/LT switchgear and substation equipment safely under SOPs.
jobs.job_description: Operate and maintain HT/LT switchgear and substation equipment safely and reliably. Operate SF6/VCB/ACB breakers/relays, follow PTW/safety procedures, read diagrams/SOPs, and log events.

jobs.brief: Install modules, mounts, and DC/AC wiring; follow HSE and assist testing.
jobs.job_description: Carry out on-site installation of solar components and assist engineers in wiring, fixing, and basic testing. Responsibilities include installing modules/mounts/conduits, assisting DC/AC terminations, following HSE, and tool upkeep/housekeeping.

jobs.brief: Supervise site civil works—foundations/RCC—ensuring quality, drawings, and safety compliance.
jobs.job_description: Supervise civil works at project sites ensuring adherence to drawings, quality, and safety standards. Oversee excavation, foundations, RCC works; verify against drawings/BOQ; maintain QA/Safety checks and daily progress reports.

jobs.brief: Field sales—prospect, pitch, close, and maintain CRM for solar/industrial offerings.
jobs.job_description: Generate and close sales for solar/industrial offerings with field outreach and lead management. Identify prospects, conduct meetings, prepare quotes, close orders, maintain MIS/CRM, and coordinate post-sales handover.

jobs.brief: Maintain fire pumps, alarms, and extinguishers; support drills and NBC/IS compliance.
jobs.job_description: Install and maintain fire protection systems complying with NBC/IS codes. Maintain fire pumps, alarm panels, extinguishers; assist in fire drills/inspections; keep records and safety compliance.

jobs.brief: Supervise electrical/mechanical technicians; ensure workmanship, safety, and daily reporting.
jobs.job_description: Supervise field technicians across electrical/mechanical tasks ensuring safety and documentation. Assign/monitor tasks, check workmanship/safety, and maintain daily reports.

jobs.brief: Structural fabrication and welding (SMAW/MIG) as per drawings and safety standards.
jobs.job_description: Execute structural fabrication and welding works per drawings and safety standards. Perform SMAW/MIG welding, follow drawings/fit-ups, and maintain tools and safety compliance.

jobs.brief: Fitting and assembly for structures/mechanical systems with safe tool handling.
jobs.job_description: Carry out fitting and assembly tasks for structures and mechanical systems at sites/workshops. Responsibilities include assembly/alignment/tightening, interpreting mechanical drawings, and tool handling with safety compliance.
